spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent. Small deviations in window sizing on the southern wall and the orientation of the secondary bathroom door.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to wall logic. All rooms from the 2D plan are present. Small hallucination in the entryway threshold and slight wall misalignment in the closet area.

furniture_mapping.notes: High mapping fidelity; kitchen island, bed, and bathroom fixtures are correctly placed. The sofa color and style vary from the simplified 2D symbol but maintain location logic.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric render with clean shadows, consistent lighting, and professional orthographic projection. Text labels are preserved correctly.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom door swing orientation is mirrored relative to the 2D floor plan.
Exterior plant placement shifted significantly from the balcony corners to the central entry path.
Windows on the bottom (south) wall appear narrower in the 3D model than shown in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated partial wall/threshold at the main entrance door compared to the open 2D plan notation.
